info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 27 at 10:21AM CDT until June 28 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cedar River at Austin affecting Mower County.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cedar River near Lansing affecting Mower County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cedar River at Austin.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The city of Austin takes specific actions to warn people and businesses.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 14.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.8 feet on 03/31/1951. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued this morning by 1130 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING
